body_html: Fun fact is that you've hit one of the slowest possible dim sizes. Just increasing the size of the last 2 dimensions to 1025 cuts down the execution time from 1.2s to 800ms. It's still slow, because the algorithm is quite dumb, but the original sizes cause a lot of cache misses.

body: Fun fact is that you've hit one of the slowest possible dim sizes. Just increasing the size of the last 2 dimensions to 1025 cuts down the execution time from 1.2s to 800ms. It's still slow, because the algorithm is quite dumb, but the original sizes cause a lot of cache misses.
